message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $11,500. I believe this is a fair starting point for negotiations.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I'm interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $10,500 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000? This offer reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,750?
Bob, I'm trying to be fair, but I can't go as low as $10,750.  My final offer is $10,900.  This is a great deal for a product of this quality.
I really like the product, but I'm still trying to stretch my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,750 again?
